Others: The Memphis Grizzlies lost to the Houston Rockets 119-115.
Ja Morant scored 27 points in the game but struggled in the fourth quarter.
Taylor Jenkins, the Grizzlies coach, made a controversial decision to bench Morant for a significant portion of the fourth quarter.
Desmond Bane missed a game-tying shot due to a costly timeout called by Jenkins.
The Grizzlies will face the Minnesota Timberwolves before playing the Houston Rockets again.
